actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution urging the President to instruct the United States delegation to the Madrid Conference on Security and Cooperation in Europe to request that the case of Raoul Wallenberg be placed on the agenda of the Conference.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Urges the President to instruct the U.S. Delegation to the Madrid Conference on Security and cooperation in Europe to request that: (1) the case of Raoul Wallenberg be placed on the agenda of the Conference; and (2) the Soviet Union be called upon to cooperate in an investigation to determine his whereabouts.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution urging the President to instruct the United States delegation to the Madrid Conference on Security and Cooperation in Europe to request that the case of Raoul Wallenberg be placed on the agenda of the Conference.
